Control.Name: chkBarLocked
Control.Text: Lock position and ignore mouse clicks

Control.Name: Label
Control.Tooltip: Sets the number of seconds the timeline spans

Control.Name: Label
Control.Tooltip: Adjusts the timeline's scale. A value of 1 is a linear timescale, whereas values less than 1 cause the timeline to become more and more "stretched out" as time approach zero.

Control.Name: chkReverseDirection
Control.Tooltip: Causes zero to be represented on the right side of the timeline instead of the left

Control.Name: EditLabel
Control.Tooltip: Provide the bar color as a hexadecimal RGB (red-green-blue) color value. For example: #3333dd

Control.Name: EditLabel
Control.Tooltip: Provide the tint color for cooldown icons as a hexadecimal ARGB (alpha-red-green-blue) color value. For example: #5500aa00

Control.Name: EditLabel
Control.Tooltip: Provide the tint color for buff icons as a hexadecimal ARGB (alpha-red-green-blue) color value. For example: #5500aa00

Control.Name: EditLabel
Control.Tooltip: Provide the tint color for debuff icons as a hexadecimal ARGB (alpha-red-green-blue) color value. For example: #5500aa00

Control.Name: EditLabel
Control.Tooltip: Enter up to six numbers seperated by commas. For example: 1,3,10,30,60

Control.Name: Label
Control.Tooltip: Cooldowns with durations shorter than this value will not be tracked.

Control.Name: Label
Control.Tooltip: Cooldowns with durations longer than this value will not be tracked.

Control.Name: Label
Control.Tooltip: Buffs with durations shorter than this value will not be tracked.

Control.Name: Label
Control.Tooltip: Buffs with durations longer than this value will not be tracked.

Control.Name: Label
Control.Tooltip: Debuffs with durations shorter than this value will not be tracked.

Control.Name: Label
Control.Tooltip: Debuffs with durations longer than this value will not be tracked.

Control.Name: chkCustomPulseAnchor
Control.Tooltip: Allows you to move the pulse anywhere on your screen using the Toggle Pulse Anchor button.

Control.Name: editCooldowns
Control.Tooltip: Enter ability names (case sensitive) separated by commas. For example: Charged Shot,Rampage,Zap,Phantasmal Armor,False Retreat,Collider

Control.Name: chkCooldownsBlacklist
Control.Tooltip: Any cooldowns on the list below will be ignored.

Control.Name: chkCooldownsWhitelist
Control.Tooltip: Any cooldowns not on the list below will be ignored.

Control.Name: editBuffs
Control.Tooltip: Enter buff names (case sensitive) separated by commas. For example: Healing Salve,Mending Probes,Phantasmal Armor,Power Link,Amplification Spike

Control.Name: chkBuffsBlacklist
Control.Tooltip: Any buffs on the list below will be ignored.

Control.Name: chkBuffsWhitelist
Control.Tooltip: Any buffs not on the list below will be ignored.

Control.Name: editDebuffs
Control.Tooltip: Enter debuff names (case sensitive) separated by commas. For example: Ignite,Fissure,Ripsaw,Phlebotomize,Zap,Haunt

Control.Name: chkDebuffsBlacklist
Control.Tooltip: Any debuffs on the list below will be ignored.

Control.Name: chkDebuffsWhitelist
Control.Tooltip: Any debuffs not on the list below will be ignored.

Control.Text: Select a bar from the list to the left to edit it!
Control.Name: HelpLabel
btnProfiles
Control.Tooltip: Allows you to keep separate bar sets for each character, class, LAS, and so on. You can use the command '/qtc swapprofile Profile Name' to swap profiles in a macro.
